product_summary: Obviously AI is a no-code machine learning tool that allows users to build and deploy AI models without writing any code. It is designed to be easy to use for people with no data science experience, and it comes with a team of data scientists who can help with data preparation, model building, and deployment. Obviously AI can be used for a variety of tasks, including predictive analytics, fraud detection, lead scoring, and customer churn prediction.
product_pros: Easy to use, no coding required
Comes with a team of data scientists for support
Can be used for a variety of tasks
product_cons: May not be as powerful as some code-based machine learning tools
Can be difficult to use for complex tasks
May not be suitable for large datasets
Lacks some features found in other machine learning tools
May not be able to handle all types of data

product_usecases.details: Obviously AI can be used to predict future events based on historical data. This can be useful for a variety of tasks, such as forecasting demand, predicting customer churn, and identifying fraud.
Obviously AI can be used to detect fraudulent transactions by identifying patterns that are not normal. This can help businesses protect themselves from financial loss.

Obviously AI can be used to score leads based on their likelihood of converting into customers. This can help businesses prioritize their sales efforts and focus on the leads that are most likely to close.
Obviously AI can be used to predict which customers are at risk of churning. This can help businesses take proactive steps to retain their customers.
Obviously AI can be used to classify images into different categories. This can be useful for a variety of tasks, such as product recognition, medical diagnosis, and security.

product_toolfor.details: Obviously AI can help data analysts build and deploy machine learning models without having to learn how to code.
Obviously AI can help business users make data-driven decisions without having to rely on data scientists.
Obviously AI can help startups build and deploy machine learning models quickly and easily.
Obviously AI can help enterprises scale their machine learning efforts and improve their data-driven decision-making.
Obviously AI offers a free plan for non-profits.
